pageProduct.name: Avene Cleanance Cleansing Gel 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Eau Thermale Avène Cleanance Cleansing Gel deeply cleanses to remove impurities which block pores (dust, pollution etc.) and reduces excess sebum, without drying out the skin.
This soap free cleanser purifies the skin, gently removes makeup, can be used on backne, and can be used as a shaving gel for men with oily skin. Clinically proven to reduce blemishes and blackheads, this biodegradable formula leaves the skin clean, clear and mattified.

Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic, soap free and paraben free. Apply morning and/or evening to wet skin, work up lather, rinse thoroughly then pat dry. If needed, finish with a light mist of Eau Thermale Avène Thermal Spring Water, gently pat dry and apply suitable skin care products.
Cleanance Cleansing Gel is especially for sensitive oily blemish-prone skin.

Common Uses

Gently removes impurities from the skin. Face and body.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). WATER (AQUA). ZINC COCETH SULFATE. LAURYL BETAINE. DECYL
GLUCOSIDE. CETEARETH-60 MYRISTYL GLYCOL. PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE. POLYSORBATE 20. CITRIC ACID. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). GREEN 5 (CI 61570). ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL. PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL. PEG-6. PPG-26-BUTETH-26. SILYBUM MARIANUM FRUIT EXTRACT. SODIUM BENZOATE. SODIUM CHLORIDE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE. YELLOW 5 (CI 19140). ZINC GLUCONATE.

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening to wet skin, work up lather, rinse thoroughly then pat dry. If needed, finish with a light mist of Eau Thermale Avène Thermal Spring Water, gently pat dry and apply suitable skin care products.
